title: Amazon Clone
description: An Amazon Clone replicates Amazon's core features, providing functionalities like product browsing, search, cart management, user accounts, and secure checkout to mimic the Amazon shopping experience.

title: Built a task management application
description: Developed a task management application to help users create, track, prioritize, and organize tasks for efficient project and time management.

title: Hotel Website Developer
description: A Hotel Website Developer creates websites for hotels, featuring room booking systems, amenities display, user reviews, and contact information to enhance the guest experience and drive online reservations
